remarks: Augmentation of a pre-Hilbert space with a norm does not affect whether it is still a pre-Hilbert space because all the original components are the same.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)
statement:
tchval.n $e |- G = ( toCHil ` W ) $.
tchphl $p |- ( W e. PreHil <-> G e. PreHil ) $.
